ProductDescription: With its 6.1-inch display, the iPhone 11 is between the 5.4-inch mini iPhone models like the iPhone 13 mini and Apple's larger models like the 6.7-inch iPhone 13 Pro Max in size. The iPhone 11 has an edge-to-edge display with slim bezels and no Home button, adopting a notch at the top for the TrueDepth camera system.
